attributes.action: CHANGE HOW COSMETIC SURGEONS CAN DELETE BAD REVIEWS AND ADD FAKE REVIEWS
attributes.additional_details: IT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR ANYONE TO MAKE AN INFORMED DECISION ABOUT A SURGEON WITH THIS FRAUD AND DESCEPTION GOING ON. THERE ARE THOUSANDS OF VULNARABLE WOMEN BEING HARRASSED AND ABUSED BY THESE PEOPLE, THEY ARE HAVING SOLICITORS CONTACT THEM AT ALL HOURS TO MAKE THEM SIGN A GAGGING ORDER AND TO REMOVE THE REVIEWS. MANY HAVE FALLEN FOUL OF THIS DECEPTION AND NOW BEING PROSECUTED FOR WRITING A REVIEW THAT WAS THE TRUE ACCOUNT OF THEIR DEALINGS WITH A SURGEON.
attributes.background: COSMETIC SURGEONS ARE CHOSEN BY REVIEWS AND IF THE REVIEWS ARE FAKE OR YOU ONLY SEE GOOD REVEIWS BECAUSE THE BAD ONES ARE BEING TAKEN DOWN BY WAY OF HARASSING PEOPLE AND INTIMIDATING THEM THEN NO ONE IS ABLE TO MAKE AN INFORMED DECISION BASED ON FRAUD AND DECEPTION.THIS IS A DANGER TO PEOPLES HEALTH
